thread.title: Art contest for mental health awareness
thread.title_full: Art contest for mental health awareness

author: Ashleigh Walters
title: Art contest for mental health awareness
text:
9:29 AM, Oct 5, 2015 Photo of an oil painting palette. Photo taken by Max Wehlte. Author: Mlaoxve/Wikipedia/public domain Max Wehlte. Author: Mlaoxve/Wikipedia/public domain Show Caption Previous Next 
PALM BEACH COUNTY, Fla. - The deadline is October 20, 2015 to share your unique perspective on mental health through original art. 
The Mental Health Association of Palm Beach County is asking for submissions from adults and children. 
The theme is to share a different perspective of mental health and help to break stigma. Painting, sculpture, music poetry and more is accepted. 
NewsChannel 5 anchor Ashleigh Walters will help in the judging process. She will also present awards at the Masquerade for Mental Health. 
The event is October 30, 2015 at PGA National Resort and Spa.
